oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Økologisk og konventionelt landbrug i Egypten - eksportsamarbejdsmuligheder for danske frugt- og grønsagsproducenter
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kledal, Paul Rye
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Overview of the organic sector in Egypt such as farm structure, number of farms, production area and location. Description of potential investments as well as guidelines for type of farms to cooperate with.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kledal, Paul Rye (2008) Økologisk og konventionelt landbrug i Egypten - eksportsamarbejdsmuligheder for danske frugt- og grønsagsproducenter. [organic and conventional farming in Egypt - Export opportunities for Danish fruit- and vegetable producers.] Speech at: Danidas Business to business program og mulighederne i Egypten, Økologisk Landsforening, Århus, 24th of April 2008.
